name: side-channel-list
description: Store information about any JS value in a side channel, using a linked list

scripts.prelint: evalmd README.md && eclint check $(git ls-files | xargs find 2> /dev/null | grep -vE 'node_modules|\.git')
scripts.postversion: auto-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-edit --amend && git tag -f "v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")"

author: Jordan Harband <ljharb@gmail.com>
